en.header: What is the purpose of the SMART method?
en.klf: The SMART method is used to help managers set clear and effective objectives.
en.tips: Today, the SMART method is used in different sectors: marketing, human resources, management, project management, etc.
en.choice_NJNQMMEpE: Help the manager quickly resolve complex problems
en.choice_EJSXfGV6N: Help the manager set clear and effective objectives
en.choice_4kImMGE6N: Help the manager set a reasonable budget

fr.header: Quel est le but de la méthode SMART?
fr.klf: L’approche SMART est utilisée pour aider les gestionnaires à définir des objectifs clairs et efficaces.
fr.tips: Aujourd'hui, l'approche SMART est utilisée dans différents domaines: marketing, ressources humaines, gestion, gestion de projet, etc.
fr.choice_V1X7zfVTE: Cultiver la capacité cognitive de gestion
fr.choice_NJNQMMEpE: Aide les gestionnaires à résoudre rapidement des problèmes complexes
fr.choice_EJSXfGV6N: Aidez les gestionnaires à fixer des objectifs clairs et efficaces
fr.choice_4kImMGE6N: Aidez les gestionnaires à établir un budget raisonnable

es.header: ¿Cuál es el propósito del método SMART?
es.klf: El método SMART se usa para ayudar a los gerentes a establecer objetivos claros y efectivos.
es.tips: Hoy, el método SMART se utiliza en diferentes sectores: marketing, recursos humanos, gestión, gestión de proyectos, etc.
es.choice_V1X7zfVTE: Desarrollar las habilidades cognitivas del gerente
es.choice_NJNQMMEpE: Ayude al administrador a resolver rápidamente problemas complejos
es.choice_EJSXfGV6N: Ayude al gerente a establecer objetivos claros y efectivos
es.choice_4kImMGE6N: Ayude al gerente a establecer un presupuesto razonable

it.header: Qual è lo scopo del metodo SMART?
it.klf: Il metodo SMART viene utilizzato per aiutare i manager a definire obiettivi chiari ed efficaci.
it.tips: Oggi il metodo SMART viene utilizzato in diversi settori: marketing, risorse umane, gestione, gestione dei progetti, ecc.
it.choice_V1X7zfVTE: Sviluppa le capacità cognitive del manager
it.choice_NJNQMMEpE: Aiuta il gestore a risolvere rapidamente problemi complessi
it.choice_EJSXfGV6N: Aiuta il gestore a stabilire obiettivi chiari ed efficaci
it.choice_4kImMGE6N: Aiuta il gestore a stabilire un budget ragionevole

de.header: What is the purpose of the SMART method?
de.klf: The SMART method is used to help managers set clear and effective objectives.
de.tips: Today, the SMART method is used in different sectors: marketing, human resources, management, project management, etc.
de.choice_NJNQMMEpE: Help the manager quickly resolve complex problems
de.choice_EJSXfGV6N: Help the manager set clear and effective objectives
de.choice_4kImMGE6N: Help the manager set a reasonable budget

ko.klf: SMART 방법은 관리자가 명확하고 효과적인 목표를 설정하는 데 도움이됩니다.
ko.tips: 오늘날 SMART 방식은 마케팅, 인사, 경영, 프로젝트 관리 등 다양한 분야에서 사용되고 있습니다.
ko.choice_NJNQMMEpE: 관리자가 복잡한 문제를 신속하게 해결할 수 있도록 지원
ko.choice_EJSXfGV6N: 관리자가 명확하고 효과적인 목표를 세우도록 돕습니다.

ru.klf: Метод SMART используется для того, чтобы помочь менеджерам устанавливать четкие и эффективные цели.
ru.tips: Сегодня метод SMART используется в разных секторах: маркетинг, человеческие ресурсы, управление, управление проектами и т. Д.
ru.choice_NJNQMMEpE: Помогите менеджеру быстро решить сложные проблемы
ru.choice_EJSXfGV6N: Помогите менеджеру установить четкие и эффективные цели

pt.header: Qual é o objetivo do método SMART?
pt.klf: O método SMART é usado para ajudar os gerentes a definir objetivos claros e eficazes.
pt.tips: Hoje, o método SMART é usado em diferentes setores: marketing, recursos humanos, gerenciamento, gerenciamento de projetos, etc.
pt.choice_V1X7zfVTE: Desenvolver as habilidades cognitivas do gerente
pt.choice_NJNQMMEpE: Ajude o gerente a resolver rapidamente problemas complexos
pt.choice_EJSXfGV6N: Ajude o gerente a definir objetivos claros e eficazes
pt.choice_4kImMGE6N: Ajude o gerente a definir um orçamento razoável

zh.klf: SMART方法用于帮助管理者设定明确有效的目标。
zh.tips: 如今，SMART方法被用于不同的领域：营销，人力资源，管理，项目管理等。
zh.choice_NJNQMMEpE: 帮助经理快速解决复杂问题
zh.choice_EJSXfGV6N: 帮助经理设定明确有效的目标
zh.choice_4kImMGE6N: 帮助经理设定合理的预算
